rationale: Assessed as Vulnerable due to an inferred decline of greater than 30% over the past fifteen years.  This is due to habitat degradation, water pollution and introduced species within the lower Niger River basin.
assessor: Snoeks, J., Laleye, P. & Contreras-MacBeath, T.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
